sentences.en: Business sponsorship must be a supplement to, not a substitute for, public funding.
sentences.cn: 商业赞助必须是公共基金的一种补充，而不能取而代之。

sentences.en: Cuts in funding have meant that equipment has been kept in service long after it should have been replaced.
sentences.cn: 资金的削减意味着早该换掉的设备一直在长期运转。

sentences.en: Funding of education had been grossly inadequate for years.
sentences.cn: 教育资金多年来极为匮乏。

sentences.en: He lowballed the cost of the project in order to obtain federal funding.
sentences.cn: 他为了得到联邦资助而故意压低项目的成本价格。

sentences.en: He was indefatigable in his efforts to secure funding for new projects.
sentences.cn: 他不知疲倦地努力为新项目寻求资金。

sentences.en: Many colleges have seen their funding cut.
sentences.cn: 许多学院的经费都遭到了削减。

sentences.en: No funding will be available until the technology is completely proven.
sentences.cn: 该技术得到充分验证后才会有拨款.

sentences.en: Private sponsorships only accounted for a third of all arts funding last year.
sentences.cn: 个人赞助只占去年所有艺术基金的三分之一。

sentences.en: Scientists now have to compete for funding, and do not share information among themselves.
sentences.cn: 科学家们现在为了资金不得不相互竞争，互相之间也不会共享信息。

sentences.en: Senator Lugar is skeptical that Congress will appropriate more funding for this purpose.
sentences.cn: 参议员卢格怀疑国会是否会拨出更多资金用于此目的。

sentences.en: Some restriction on funding was necessary.
sentences.cn: 有必要对资金提供加以限制。

sentences.en: The council has revised its projections of funding requirements upwards.
sentences.cn: 地方议会调高了对资金需求的预测.

sentences.en: The loss of respect for British science is correlated to reduced funding.
sentences.cn: 英国科学界不如以前受重视，资金也因此减少。

sentences.en: They hope for government funding for the programme.
sentences.cn: 他们希望得到政府为这一计划提供的资金。

sentences.en: They risk losing the next tranche of funding.
sentences.cn: 他们冒着失去下一笔资金的风险。

sentences.en: University funding was tremendously biased towards scientists.
sentences.cn: 大学科研经费向科学家极大地倾斜。

words.tran_cn: 资金筹集人；资金筹集活动

trans.tran_cn: 用发行长期债券的方法来收回短期债券，提供资金
trans.tran_en: Funding is money which a government or organization provides for a particular purpose
